title: The Ball
notes: Played through intro and started playing game but crashed to desktop after about 15 minutes. Haven't tested further.

title: The Ball
notes: Game launched and ran fine. I played about 2 hours so far without any problems.
On first launch an error message about .NET framework appears, but this can be ignored and doesn't pop up again. The game never ran well on windows and it doesn't run much worse on Steam Play.
title: The Ball
